item.title: Simple Smelting [317]
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:3, topic:374836”][quote author=rash link=topic=470802.msg3442973#msg3442973 date=1293197127]
Im not sure, but wouldnt you make a case, like um…

Case 11666:
if (ItemID ==438 &&playerHasItem (438)){
deleteItem (436, 1);
deleteItem (438, 1);
addItem (2349, 1);
setAnimation (894);
}

I think this is wrong, but yea
[/quote]
:DDDDD what??
;D

No.

Add the code in

case 192:

Like this

if(UsedOnObjectID == 11666 && ItemID == 436 && playerHasItem(438)){ deleteItem(436, 1); deleteItem(438, 1); addItem(2349, 1); setAnimation(894); }

In ( ( client.java ) ).[/quote]

well, i knew he had to use a case O_O

Read full topic
